titlestmt.titleproper: Walter Breen, John J. Ford, and The 1827 Quarter
titlestmt.author: Jared Goldfarb

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created with EADitor by user dhill.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Walter Breen, John J. Ford, and The 1827 Quarter
did.abstract: Letters concerning a rough draft of "The 1827 Quarter" with several copies of each included.

scopecontent.p: In the 1960’s John Ford and Walter Breen were working on a draft of a book called The 1827 Quarter. The book is about a rare quarter struck in 1827. Letter from John Ford to Henry Norweb, dated April 1, 1963, regarding Breen’s original rough draft and enclosing the cover letter from Breen to Ford and Breen’s rough draft of the book. Copy of the above letter, cover letter and three copies of the rough draft.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Walter Breen, John J. Ford, and The 1827 Quarter, 1963, American Numismatic Society, Archives.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
